topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0 Beta: Post-Installation Tasks

body.p: After HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade is fully installed and deployed, perform the tasks in this section.

section.title: Deploy the Horizon Patch
section.p: After deploying the KVM cloud, on each controller node, apply a patch to incorporate specific UI rebranding changes.
For more information, see Deploying the Horizon Patch

section.title: Configure the DCN Metadata Agent
section.p: After deploying the KVM cloud, on each compute node, update the following lines in the /etc/default/nuage-metadata-agent.
For more information, see Configuring the DCN Metadata Agent

section.title: Verify the VSC VMs
section.p: The installation process creates virtual machines for VSC. VSC VMs are installed and are operational.

body.section: The installation creates a VRS-G node as part of the cloud deployment. Use the following command to verify that the VRS-G is active

section.title: Verify LDAP
section.p: You should verify that LDAP is functioning correctly.
For more information, see Verifying the LDAP Deployment
